name: assign_resource
body: let old_id = ctx . accounts . entry . id ;
let bytes = ctx . accounts . caller . key () . to_bytes () ;
let new_id = Pubkey :: new (& bytes [0 .. 32]) ;
ctx . accounts . entry . id = new_id ;
msg ! ("Case 085: ID changed from {} to {}" , old_id , new_id) ;

name: init_escrow
attributes: # [doc = " 管理者が資金をロックしてエスクローを初期化"]
body: let esc = & mut ctx . accounts . escrow ;
esc . creator = ctx . accounts . creator . key () ;
esc . beneficiary = ctx . accounts . beneficiary . key () ;
esc . release_time = release_ts ;
esc . amount = ctx . accounts . creator . to_account_info () . lamports () ;
msg ! ("Escrow initialized: {} lamports locked until {} for {}" , esc . amount , release_ts , esc . beneficiary) ;

name: release
attributes: # [doc = " ベネフィシアリ（受益者）が署名付きで資金を受け取る"]
body: require ! (ctx . accounts . beneficiary . is_signer , ErrorCode :: Unauthorized) ;
let now = Clock :: get () ? . unix_timestamp ;
require ! (now >= ctx . accounts . escrow . release_time , ErrorCode :: TooEarly) ;
let esc_info = ctx . accounts . escrow . to_account_info () ;
* * esc_info . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? -= ctx . accounts . escrow . amount ;
* * ctx . accounts . beneficiary . to_account_info () . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? += ctx . accounts . escrow . amount ;
msg ! ("{} lamports released to {}" , ctx . accounts . escrow . amount , ctx . accounts . beneficiary . key ()) ;

fields.name: escrow
fields.attribute: # [doc = " エスクロー用アカウントを初期化"] # [account (init , payer = creator , space = 8 + 32 + 32 + 8 + 8 , seeds = [b"escrow" , creator . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: beneficiary
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 受益者の Pubkey を設定（署名不要）"]

fields.name: escrow
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"escrow" , escrow . creator . as_ref ()] , bump , has_one = beneficiary)]
